step.em: Be compassionate yourself and your compassion apply to your children as well.

details.d: Be there for them and love them unconditionally.

step.em: Find ways to be compassionate daily.

details.d: Let your children see you acting in a compassionate way with other people and learn from your example.

step.em: Find positive acts that your children can participate in with you that demonstrate compassionate behavior.

details.d: For example, perhaps you've found a stray dog and have taken it home. Have your children help clean and feed the dog, take it to the vet with you, and give it a new home. This will help teach your children that everyone deserves love and care.

step.em: Read stories about compassionate deeds with your children.

details.d: These can be drawn from your faith, your spiritual sources, your general beliefs, and stories you've loved yourself.
Find a suitable volunteer opportunity and get involved in it as a family.
